page.title: 17THE VILLAGE HOME
page.content: We surveyed 50{houses}in our block and found out the following information. First is the name of the{item}we asked about followed by the number who answered yes. Bathroom 50:Inside lavatory 50: Television 49:Telephone 46:Computer 6:Fridge 48:Freezer 39: Larder 37: Central heating 18: Electricity 50: Washing machine 42: Electric drier 28:Electric food mixer 34:Electric iron 50.Next we asked what{fuel}people used as well as electricity.These were the results. Coal 42:Bottle gas 22 (no mains gas available):Wood 38:Oil 5.We found out that 48 homes had{gardens}& 43 had {cars.Pets}kept were dog,cat,hamster, rabbit,tortoise,budgie,goat,dove,tame pheasant,duck,horse,chicken & geese.Pets were kept in 38 of the houses surveyed.
